glsa.title: Varnish: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Varnish, the worst of which could allow a remote attacker to create a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: Varnish is a web application accelerator.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Varnish. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could cause a Denial of Service condition via a specially crafted GET request. Furthermore a local attacker could obtain sensitive information through insecure permissions on logfiles.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Varnish users should upgrade to the latest version:
